name: Detune
description:
Detune is a short rhythm game with platform elements.

Something strange happened in your kingdom, and suddenly it is full of monsters and thorns! Fortunately you are THE GOD OF BASS* **, so you embark on a journey to defeat the evil creatures using the power of music.

Controls:

  • Arrows to move
  • Number keys (1 to 8) to jam to the rhythm (while standing in a glowing field)

Written in the ooc programming language with my own engine, Vamos.

--

* actually a Godess
** is not just restricted to bass
